alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 06 at 11:04PM CDT until June 07 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PHELPS...NORTHWESTERN KEARNEY...BUFFALO AND SOUTHEASTERN DAWSON COUNTIES... At 1104 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Odessa, or 9 miles northwest of Kearney, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Kearney around 1115 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 251 and 291. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
